body:
Could acoustic simulations be a cool thing to have in grasshopper, maybe a part of Ladybug/Honeybee? I think so!

I have tried Pachyderm ([http://www.food4rhino.com/project/pachyderm?etx)](http://www.food4rhino.com/project/pachyderm?etx)) but it could be nice if it were in the same workflow of HB energy/daylight simulations. So it was possible to have a even more holistic analysis of a design.....
